title: Magic Water Show and Dinner Show
description: This all-inclusive Lima nightlife tour is a great way to visit top attractions in the evening. Visit the popular Magic Water Circuit and see it all lit up at night, and then enjoy a sit-down dinner and show complete with a Pisco sour.
all_descriptions: This all-inclusive Lima nightlife tour is a great way to visit top attractions in the evening. Visit the popular Magic Water Circuit and see it all lit up at night, and then enjoy a sit-down dinner and show complete with a Pisco sour.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:KulTour Peru, ortiz de Zevallos 153 - Miraflores, Lima 051 PeruLet´s enjoy and walk around in one of the main attractions of the city has to offer at night. Is considerated a highlight by the locals and it has the Guinness book record for the largest fountain complex in the world, displaying 13 distinct fountains and many are interactives. All of the fountains are illuminated at night, many with continuously changing color schemes. A colorfull laser light program synchronized with classical and Peruvian music makes the fountains sparkle and shine as the water flows in unique patterns and shapes. After that a Criolla Buffet is going to wait for us in a traditional restaurant, it’s going to offer you typical dances from the coast, mountains and rainforest while you are enjoying your delicious dinner. Came with us and live this unforgettable experience
provider:
KulTour Peru

reviews.title: Nice enjoyable day
reviews.text: Beautiful colorful water fountain show. Dinner with show was awesome! Great birthday experience to do.

reviews.title: Beautiful Night !!!
reviews.text: We really enjoyed  the Show and the park is fantastic,  we didnt expect many fountains and meanings all around, the guide was awesome, we pass skiping the long line, Jordan did a great job, after the show we go the restaurant for the dinner show, we really like it , it finish a little late 10:00pm we back at the hotel around 10:25pm.our driver was nice too, thank you KulTour Perú.

reviews.title: MAGIC WATER SHOW PARK, AMAZING !!!
reviews.text: Its more that i expect, i really thought that its going to be  one fountain tha we could see the show but its more than that, there are many fountains around with music and a good complement of the history, Jordan Mendieta was great with the explonation, of every fountain and the show was nice too... after that the show was great they will finish with a great  exhibition of Peruvian de Paso horses and Marinera. Recommend it !!!

reviews.title: AMAZING Water show and Dinner Show with Jordan!
reviews.text: FANTASTIC!! Jordan was an amazing guide and host.  What a delightful personality and knowledge.We loved the water show!  What Ana amazing display of culture and history in such a unique way.  And the dinner show—more than ever expected!! The dancing and horses were amazing.  As a horse owner myself, I can say the horses were beautiful and well cared for.  It was stunning to see the Peruvian Pasos.

reviews.title: Magic Water Show in Lima, Great !!!
reviews.text: Thank You Greta ! for a fantastic moment !the park is great ! and the show is so incredible, they will show to you all the peruvian history and many details that your tour guide will explain to you, also every fountain have a meaning and it was fantastic to understand it !Jordan our driver was very nice in everymoment!

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.text: Definitely not worth the money.We did not "skip the line" at the water show instead we stood in line that went around the block.The food at dinner was mostly beans and very little meat. It was ok but by no means impressive.The dancing was entertaining!This is definitely a tourist trap!

reviews.title: Gotta see it!
reviews.text: Our guide was great, he was funny and full of great information. The dancers were excellent as was the food. The water show is awesome! Don't miss it.

reviews.title: SURPASSING OUR EXPECTATIONS
reviews.text: Every aspect of the tour which included the ' magical water fountain ' tour , the ' traditional dancers ' as well as the food served at the dinner buffet was excellent . What made this tour even more special was the enthusiasm and the enters shown JORDAN our tour guide. His contribution and the attitude towards the tour gave us so much we came back to the hotel feeling that we were treated like VIPs.... Thank you Jordan for giving us such a memorable evening. This was something very very special and a evening to always remember.

reviews.title: Great tour-our best night time activity in Lima
reviews.text: We totally enjoyed the tour with Jordan and our driver (Raenon- sorry for the spelling but this is how you say it.)  The waterpark is totally amazing and it was great to have Jordan explain the meaning of the fountains.  We could have figured this out on our own and spent a lot less money but Jordan was so personable and we felt very safe driving there which was important.  Also then we had the extra activity of going to Barranco and the dinner show.  The food at the show was just okay but the dancing was really great.  We thoroughly enjoyed our evening out.
